Interface ChannelProcessorRequester

public interface ChannelProcessorRequester
extends org.epics.pvData.pv.Requester

An interface implemented by a channel process requester.

Method Detail

becomeProcessor

void becomeProcessor()
Called as a result of calling ChannelProcessor.requestProcess.

canNotProcess

void canNotProcess(java.lang.String reason)
A queueProcessRequest failed.

Parameters:
reason - The reason why the request failed.

recordProcessResult

void recordProcessResult(org.epics.pvData.pv.Status status)
The result of the process request. This is called with the record still active and locked. The requester can read data from the record.

Parameters:
status - Completion status.

recordProcessComplete

void recordProcessComplete()
Called to signify process completion. This is called with the record unlocked.

lostRightToProcess

void lostRightToProcess()
The ChannelProcessorRequester has lost the right to request processing.. The requester does not have to call channelProcessor.detach.
